sense.def:
Pri telefonu je
the mouthpiece
tisti del slušalke, v katerega govorimo.

seg.quote: She had her hand over the mouthpiece.

sense.def:
Pri glasbilu je
the mouthpiece
tisti del, v katerega glasbenik piha.

The mouthpiece of a person or organization
je človek, ki javno objavlja mnenje in ukrepe drugega človeka ali neke organizacije.

seg.quote: He became the official mouthpiece of the leadership.
